short_desc.ja: 陪審員欠席で罰金や逮捕と脅迫し支払い要求
short_desc.en: Threaten fines or arrest for missing jury duty to demand payment

cultural_lever.ja: 法的義務への恐怖・司法制度への敬意
cultural_lever.en: Fear of legal consequences and respect for judicial system

scenario.ja: 1) 裁判所職員を名乗る 2) 陪審員欠席の虚偽主張 3) 逮捕令状があると脅迫 4) 罰金の即時支払い要求
scenario.en: 1) Pose as court official 2) False claim of missed jury duty 3) Threaten arrest warrant 4) Demand immediate fine payment

ja: 裁判所は電話で罰金請求しない
地方裁判所に直接確認
en: Courts don't demand payment by phone
